title: Review & Final Quiz
description: Participate in a role-play challenge and complete the final interactive quiz.

content.story: Alex has learned so much about digital wellness and safety! Now it's time to put all these skills together. Alex's friend Maya needs help with some digital challenges. Can you help Alex give the right advice?

data.instruction: Help Alex match each digital problem with the best solution. Drag the solutions to the correct problems.
items: Use privacy settings and report the behavior
Set specific times for social media use
Think before posting and consider consequences
Get permission before sharing photos of others

categories.name: Maya is being cyberbullied
items: Use privacy settings and report the behavior

categories.name: Maya feels addicted to social media
items: Set specific times for social media use

data.question: Which digital strategies will you adopt today?
options: Adjusting privacy settings on all my accounts
Setting specific times for social media use
data.explanation: Adopting all these strategies creates a comprehensive approach to digital wellness and safety.
